mapper.select: select a.*,b.copies_title,b.copies_start_time,b.copies_end_time from transaction_quest a left join transaction_copies b on a.copies_id = b.copies_id where a.copies_id = #{copiesId}

select count(*) from transaction_copies where copies_end_time < now()
and copies_title like concat(concat('%', #{copiesTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select count(*) from transaction_copies where copies_end_time > now()
and copies_title like concat(concat('%', #{copiesTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
